00045 /*-- Globals -------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 
00047 /* The analyzer name (client name) as seen by other MIDAS clients   */
00048 char *analyzer_name = "Analyzer";
00049 
00050 /* analyzer_loop is called with this interval in ms (0 to disable)  */
00051 INT analyzer_loop_period = 0;
00052 
00053 /* default ODB size */
00054 INT odb_size = DEFAULT_ODB_SIZE;
00055 
00056 /* ODB structures */
00057 RUNINFO runinfo;
00058 GLOBAL_PARAM global_param;
00059 EXP_PARAM exp_param;
00060 TRIGGER_SETTINGS trigger_settings;
00061 
00062 /* number of channels */
00063 #define N_ADC          8
00064 #define N_TDC          8
00065 #define N_SCLR         8
00066 
00067 #define ADC_N_BINS   600
00068 #define ADC_X_LOW      0
00069 #define ADC_X_HIGH  1200
00070 
00071 #define TDC_N_BINS   500
00072 #define TDC_X_LOW      0
00073 #define TDC_X_HIGH  2500
00074 
00075 #define ADC_ID      1000
00076 #define TDC_ID      1100
00077 
00078 int analyze_trigger_event(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent);
00079 int analyze_scaler_event(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent);
00080 
00081 /*-- Bank list -----------------------------------------------------*/
00082 
00083 BANK_LIST trigger_bank_list[] = {
00084    {"ADC0", TID_WORD, N_ADC, NULL},
00085    {"TDC0", TID_WORD, N_TDC, NULL},
00086    {""},
00087 };
00088 
00089 BANK_LIST scaler_bank_list[] = {
00090    {"SCLR", TID_DWORD, N_SCLR, NULL},
00091    {""},
00092 };
00093 
00094 /*-- Event request list --------------------------------------------*/
00095 
00096 ANALYZE_REQUEST analyze_request[] = {
00097    {"Trigger",                  /* equipment name */
00098     1,                          /* event ID */
00099     TRIGGER_ALL,                /* trigger mask */
00100     GET_SOME,                   /* get some events */
00101     "SYSTEM",                   /* event buffer */
00102     TRUE,                       /* enabled */
00103     "", "",
00104     analyze_trigger_event,      /* analyzer routine */
00105     NULL,                       /* module list */
00106     trigger_bank_list,          /* list */
00107     10000,                      /* RWNT buffer size */
00108     },
00109 
00110    {"Scaler",                   /* equipment name */
00111     2,                          /* event ID */
00112     TRIGGER_ALL,                /* trigger mask */
00113     GET_ALL,                    /* get all events */
00114     "SYSTEM",                   /* event buffer */
00115     TRUE,                       /* enabled */
00116     "", "",
00117     analyze_scaler_event,       /* analyzer routine */
00118     NULL,                       /* module list */
00119     scaler_bank_list,           /* bank list */
00120     0,                          /* RWNT buffer size */
00121     },
00122 
00123    {""}
00124 };

00126 /*-- Analyzer Init -------------------------------------------------*/
00127 
00128 INT analyzer_init()
00129 {
00130    HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00131    char str[80];
00132    int i;
00133 
00134    RUNINFO_STR(runinfo_str);
00135    EXP_PARAM_STR(exp_param_str);
00136    EXP_EDIT_STR(exp_edit_str);
00137    GLOBAL_PARAM_STR(global_param_str);
00138    TRIGGER_SETTINGS_STR(trigger_settings_str);
00139 
00140    /* following code opens ODB structures to make them accessible
00141       from the analyzer code as C structures */
00142 
00143    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00144    db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo", strcomb(runinfo_str));
00145    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo", &hKey);
00146    if (db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &runinfo, sizeof(runinfo), MODE_READ,
00147                       NULL, NULL) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00148       cm_msg(MERROR, "analyzer_init", "Cannot open \"/Runinfo\" tree in ODB");
00149       return 0;
00150    }
00151 
00152    db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Run Parameters", strcomb(exp_param_str));
00153 
00154    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Run Parameters", &hKey);
00155    if (db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &exp_param, sizeof(exp_param), MODE_READ,
00156                       NULL, NULL) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00157       cm_msg(MERROR, "analyzer_init",
00158              "Cannot open \"/Experiment/Run Parameters\" tree in ODB");
00159       return 0;
00160    }
00161 
00162    db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Edit on start", strcomb(exp_edit_str));
00163 
00164    sprintf(str, "/%s/Parameters/Global", analyzer_name);
00165    db_create_record(hDB, 0, str, strcomb(global_param_str));
00166    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00167    if (db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &global_param, sizeof(global_param),
00168                       MODE_READ, NULL, NULL) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00169       cm_msg(MERROR, "analyzer_init", "Cannot open \"%s\" tree in ODB", str);
00170       return 0;
00171    }
00172 
00173    db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Equipment/Trigger/Settings", strcomb(trigger_settings_str));
00174    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Equipment/Trigger/Settings", &hKey);
00175 
00176    if (db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &trigger_settings, sizeof(trigger_settings),
00177                       MODE_READ, NULL, NULL) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00178       cm_msg(MERROR, "analyzer_init",
00179              "Cannot open \"/Equipment/Trigger/Settings\" tree in ODB");
00180       return 0;
00181    }
00182 
00183   /*---- user code to book histos ----------------------------------*/
00184 
00185    /* book ADC histos */
00186    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++) {
00187       sprintf(str, "ADC%02d", i);
00188       HBOOK1(ADC_ID + i, str, ADC_N_BINS, (float) ADC_X_LOW, (float) ADC_X_HIGH, 0.f);
00189    }
00190 
00191    /* book TDC histos */
00192    for (i = 0; i < N_TDC; i++) {
00193       sprintf(str, "TDC%02d", i);
00194       HBOOK1(TDC_ID + i, str, TDC_N_BINS, (float) TDC_X_LOW, (float) TDC_X_HIGH, 0.f);
00195    }
00196 
00197    return SUCCESS;
00198 }

00204    return CM_SUCCESS;

00211    return CM_SUCCESS;

00213 
00214 /*-- End of Run ----------------------------------------------------*/
00215 
00216 INT ana_end_of_run(INT run_number, char *error)
00217 {
00218    FILE *f;
00219    time_t now;
00220    char str[256];
00221    int size;
00222    DWORD n;
00223    HNDLE hDB;
00224    BOOL flag;
00225 
00226    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00227 
00228    /* update run log if run was written and running online */
00229 
00230    size = sizeof(flag);
00231    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Write data", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00232    if (flag && runinfo.online_mode == 1) {
00233       /* update run log */
00234       size = sizeof(str);
00235       str[0] = 0;
00236       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data Dir", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00237       if (str[0] != 0)
00238          if (str[strlen(str) - 1] != DIR_SEPARATOR)
00239             strcat(str, DIR_SEPARATOR_STR);
00240       strcat(str, "runlog.txt");
00241 
00242       f = fopen(str, "a");
00243 
00244       time(&now);
00245       strcpy(str, ctime(&now));
00246       str[10] = 0;
00247 
00248       fprintf(f, "%s\t%3d\t", str, runinfo.run_number);
00249 
00250       strcpy(str, runinfo.start_time);
00251       str[19] = 0;
00252       fprintf(f, "%s\t", str + 11);
00253 
00254       strcpy(str, ctime(&now));
00255       str[19] = 0;
00256       fprintf(f, "%s\t", str + 11);
00257 
00258       size = sizeof(n);
00259       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Equipment/Trigger/Statistics/Events sent",
00260                    &n, &size, TID_DWORD, TRUE);
00261 
00262       fprintf(f, "%dk\t", (int) (n / 1000.0 + 0.5));
00263       fprintf(f, "%s\n", exp_param.comment);
00264 
00265       fclose(f);
00266    }
00267 
00268    return CM_SUCCESS;
00269 }

00292 /*-- Analyze Events ------------------------------------------------*/
00293 
00294 INT analyze_trigger_event(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00295 {
00296    int i;
00297    WORD *padc, *ptdc;
00298 
00299    /* look for ADC0 and TDC0 bank, return if not present */
00300    if (bk_locate(pevent, "ADC0", &padc) == 0 || bk_locate(pevent, "TDC0", &ptdc) == 0)
00301       return 0;
00302 
00303    /* fill ADC and TDC histos */
00304    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00305       HF1(ADC_ID + i, padc[i], 1.f);
00306    for (i = 0; i < N_TDC; i++)
00307       HF1(ADC_ID + i, ptdc[i], 1.f);
00308 
00309    return CM_SUCCESS;
00310 }
00311 
00312 INT analyze_scaler_event(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00313 {
00314    return CM_SUCCESS;
00315 }
